How often should data be synchronized (in hours)
If you unlink this account from %s, the synchronization status gets lost. Linking them again later, requires a full synchronization to be executed again.

An account with uuid %s exists both in the local database and on the remote backend. When you link both, you need to decide, if, initially, you want to upload local data to the remote backend or download remote data to the local database.
An account with uuid %s already exists in the local database and is linked to a different remote backend.
Remote backend %s will be removed. This will not affect data stored locally or remotely, but synchronization status gets lost.
Remote data for this account will be deleted. Make sure no other devices are linked to it.
Local data for this account will be deleted.
The trial period for testing feature %s has ended.
